Enhui Rao

Thanks For showing interest to check about me, i’m Enhui Rao. I cook delicious code library for fun. I’m a Born programmer, computer lover, romantic novel reader, like to play dance machine! curious towards css3,html5,nodejs,ES6,sql,and so on.This is my personal blog. It currently has 21 posts in 14 categories which combinedly have 9523 words, which will take an average reader ( WPM) approximately 47.615 minutes to read. The most recent post is "慎用try catch" which was published on 16 Dec 2018. The last commit was on Saturday, 22 Dec 2018 at 11:34 AM UTC.

前端妹子一枚，我平时比较繁忙（正业：打杂、犯花痴、偷窥帅锅，副业：码农、前端）,所以知识点有些可能会有问题，看不过眼（强迫症的请重视我的后面一句），欢迎小伙伴们帮忙评论修改。

非常欢迎各位研发大佬们加入上海京东团队，有意向可以投简历到邮箱raoenhui@jd.com中，TKS。
